Appearance

FireCat

An elegant Node.js framework based on Koajs

Simple, elegant, and fast to build your next application

Get Started
Installation

Elegant and Simple

Use decorators to implement request interception, permission validation, field validation, and other functions.

Based on Koajs

FireCat is not reinventing the wheel, but standing on the shoulders of giants, expanding various functions based on Koajs.

High Performance

FireCat is as fast as Koajs.

TypeScript

FireCat fully supports TypeScript.

Webpack

FireCat uses Webpack for packaging and deployment.

Free Expansion

You can freely expand your decorators to achieve various requirements.
